snippet.title: SPINE — Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Is your Gun Fu strong enough? Wishlist us at https://spine.game/!

Experience cinematic action like never before with SPINE, a fast-paced action game by Nekki. Dive into the vibrant, cinematic, and action-packed vision of a cyberpunk near-future with a rebellious street artist, Redline, and her sentient combat implant, Spine, as they challenge the autocratic AI regime of Tensor Corporation while learning to trust each other. Participate in highly cinematic gunfights staged by actual movie specialists, relive your favorite epic action scenes, and create your own.

Follow SPINE on social networks:

https://discord.gg/playspine
https://twitter.com/playspine
https://www.tiktok.com/@playspine
https://www.instagram.com/playspine
https://www.facebook.com/playspine
